This game is cracked wrong,It doesn't work

I get this error when trying to start game. "The program can't start because PhysXLoader.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem."

I've installed twice and same error. I'm assuming I copied over the crack right, as I don't usually have any problems. Know how I can fix this???

Thanks in advance.
thanks,.. nice upload,... well done,.. ; )

@baddgoat =)

Thought Id finally get round to signing up since you needed some help.  I had the same error on my installation.  For me reinstalling physx from my nvidia GPU drivers fixed the problem and the game now works.  Should be located in C:\Nvidia\DisplayDriver\280.26\WinVista_Win7_64\English\Physx
(Yours may be slightly different depending on your driver version OS and native tongue but this should give you a pretty good idea)  Alternatively just reinstall your whole graphics card driver.  I decided against this though coz of the reboot roundabout that goes with... lol )

Hope thats some help for you and its nice to have a voice here at last lol.  Guess its about time I said thanks to both extremezone and .bone. who I both regularly take torrents from hahaha.  Thanks folks. =)

Works great on my rig (i5-2500K/8GB RAM/Geforce 570/Windows 7 x64).  Thanks much for the upload, extemezone.

ok so i have updated my ati radeon hd 4200 and im still getting the missing dll msg. help please?
the "PhysXLoader.dll is missing" error msg.

To fix the "PhysXLoader.dll" missing error you have to in install PhysX which is located in "Xotic install folder\redist\PhysX\" or if you so clumsy that you don't know how to find it just search for "PhysXSoftware.exe" after you install Xotic.

PS: yes PhysX is made by Nvidia but don't worry it's working with ATI cards as well.

Hey... this really helped me: http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=2124653  .

"By any chance is the sample rate on your sound card set to 96,000 Hz or higher? There's a known issue trying to play 3D sounds at that setting. If so, as a workaround, you can lower the sample rate and it should load fine." is what they say!
